description: Change I18N_CONFIG.ns from ['common', 'client-portal', 'msp'] to ['common'] in packages/ui/src/lib/i18n/config.ts
Add ROUTE_NAMESPACES constant to packages/ui/src/lib/i18n/config.ts mapping route prefixes to namespace arrays for both MSP and client portal routes
Add getNamespacesForRoute(pathname) function to packages/ui/src/lib/i18n/config.ts â€” exact match first, then longest prefix match, fallback to ['common']
I18nProvider in packages/ui/src/lib/i18n/client.tsx accepts optional namespaces prop (string[])
I18nProvider calls i18next.loadNamespaces() for namespaces not yet loaded when namespaces prop changes
I18nWrapper in packages/tenancy/src/components/i18n/I18nWrapper.tsx uses usePathname() to get current route
I18nWrapper calls getNamespacesForRoute(pathname) and passes result as namespaces prop to I18nProvider
I18nWrapper re-resolves namespaces when pathname changes (route navigation)
Create scripts/generate-pseudo-locale.ts with --locale and --fill CLI arguments
Pseudo-locale script reads all English namespace JSON files including nested features/ and msp/ directories
Pseudo-locale script outputs files under server/public/locales/<locale>/ preserving directory structure
Pseudo-locale script replaces all leaf string values with the fill string
Pseudo-locale script preserves {{variables}} within fill strings (e.g., '1111 {{name}} 1111')
Pseudo-locale script preserves JSON key structure exactly (nested objects maintained)
Add pseudo-locales xx and yy to LOCALE_CONFIG.supportedLocales
Rename server/public/locales/{lang}/msp.json to server/public/locales/{lang}/msp/core.json for all 7 languages
Update all useTranslation('msp') references in codebase to useTranslation('msp/core')
ROUTE_NAMESPACES uses 'msp/core' (not 'msp') for all MSP routes
Sync packages/core/src/lib/i18n/config.ts with any locale config changes from packages/ui/src/lib/i18n/config.ts
Client portal loads correct namespaces per route with no regressions
MSP portal with flag OFF has zero behavior change (no namespace loading, no I18nWrapper)
MSP portal with flag ON loads msp/core namespace correctly via lazy loading
Phase 1 tests updated to reference msp/core instead of msp and continue passing
npm run build succeeds with no TypeScript errors after all changes
